content: this pattern is a free pattern on my website https //www windingroadcrochet com/crochet-pouch-first-aid-kit-pattern/ or you can purchase the pdf pattern above to have a neat clean printer-friendly large font ad-free version of the pattern the pattern is written in english using us terms pattern level easy this pattern uses the chain single_crochet working in back loops only slip_stitch materials needed worsted weight yarn 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle and scissors zipper this listing is for a pdf pattern instant download not a finished product please make sure to download adobe reader at www adobe com if you do not already have it on your computer all rights reserved copyright ©2021 winding road crochet purchaser is not allowed to copy sell or reproduce this pattern in any way because this is a digital product there will be no refunds after purchase
